scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service aireshbhat/gnosisauctionpolygon

scripts.deploy:avalanche: yarn prepare:avalanche && graph deploy --product hosted-service gnosis-auction/ga-avax
